page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: {Housing in this area falls into three main categories:- (1) Traditional stone built farmhouses and cottages and small terraced houses seen in Abbotsham. These are well maintained and fully occupied. In the main street one of the houses serves as village stores and post office. (2) The larger, mainly Victorian houses nearer Westward Ho!,many of which date from the days of the Imperial Services College. (3) New housing,mainly in the form of Bungalows and detached houses,situated mostly in Abbotsham and on the Londonderry and Moreton Park Estates nearer Bideford. Most of this growth has taken place in the last fifteen years.
